headline: Jim Jordan says Trump is ‘right on target’ to suggest EXECUTIONS for Hillary’s campaign aides
author: Admin Melony B. DeFord
sentences: So it seems wishful thinking is being voiced by those who do not want to be associated with the consequences they elected to embrace to gain the responsibiliies and benefits of office.
Discouragement for betrayal of societies full faith and confidence requires a comensurate exemplary penalty.
To my knowledge, no statute of limitations exists for their commission, as it lacks utility to do so.
High crimes and Misdemeanors are what we see here.
